The sloths have been causing problems—yes, really—but this is too much! The repositories of wisdom in the {@Rgn:30008$$Lower Archive} were well preserved...until those rascals tore up the place.

We have a blueprint of one repository of wisdom courtesy of the Consos baraka, so you can rebuild them.

And while you're wandering around here, any help repairing the broken repositories of wisdom would be much appreciated. When you're done, go see {@LinkCreature:230#1030$$Tulan}. He took news of the attack rather poorly.

I can't stop weeping. It's embarrassing.

The repositories of wisdom are a mess—and that's worth crying about.

Why does nature have to be so...so...wild!

Someone like you should've been assigned here, not me.
